about_the_game:
What is the game?


Watson is a 2-player co-op horror-adventure game about two robots in a fantasy world on the run from an unidentified villain. Work together to solve puzzles, explore an unknown world, and escape from the villain.

  • Horror adventure game.
  • Games that are first-person and have no dialog
  • Games with one story but multiple ways to play
  • A two-player co-op game
  • Play time: 90 minutes
  • Uses Unreal Engine 5 / Supports Dolby Atmos / Supports Dolby Vision / Supports optimization for NVIDIA 3.5, AMD, etc.

Why should I play this game?

True horror

Horror adventure game

This game conveys to the player the feeling of being alone in the dark, helpless and fearful of the uncertainty of the future. It emphasizes the eerie atmosphere and the fear of the unknown, and it's a game that keeps its horror quiet, which is why it's a true horror game, and not just unpleasantness from gore or gory scenes.

Complete immersion

First-person dialog-free game

This is a one-of-a-kind game that you experience from start to finish in first-person, with no dialog. With no loading screens or cutscenes, players experience immersion where every action affects the game world. Without dialogue or text, the game is informed by elements in the environment, using light, color, sound effects, and animation to convey mood and fear. Games with these characteristics provide players with authentic interactions and experiences.

A movie in the making

One story, but many ways

The game offers multiple paths based on the player's choices, but the overall story is fixed, conveying an overwhelming sense that the player is in the grip of fate. With sophisticated emotional manipulation and sensational storytelling, you'll finally feel like you've played a movie of sorts

Together

Two-player co-op

With difficulty levels and age restrictions that make it accessible to everyone, you can play co-op with your best friend, your lover of 10 years, or even your 50-something dad and his teenage son. You can also play with friends and family on the other side of the world simply because they have a PC or console device.

Short but intense

Play time: 90 minutes

This game delivers a fully immersive and emotional experience in a short playtime. Each moment is carefully designed, so you'll be able to utilize your time efficiently and still feel the full impact of the game.

Just like real life

Uses Unreal Engine 5 / Supports Dolby Atmos / Dolby Vision support coming soon / Optimizations for NVIDIA 3.5, AMD, and more

The game will immerse you in the world with beautiful graphics and realistic sounds that are indistinguishable from reality. The excellent spatial sound technology and light effects completely immerse you in the game world. When you play a game of this quality, you experience the world as if you were in a movie.

  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Watson is a two-player co-op horror adventure game. The two cute little robots must escape from the evil beings chasing them. Explore a grand and beautiful Victorian city with a steampunk makeover. Uncover secrets about the city, the robots, and the beings chasing them. But don't get caught!
